description:
She`s a strong fighter that Takeru has had problems with like visiting the shop she works at which was a maid cafe named Macaroon. She has threatened him with death if he ever tells someone else about it.
Her Maken is "Hawk" which looks like a mechanical boot when activated. Her Maken`s ability boosts her already superior agility and speed, as well as her physical power.
name: Shinatsu Azuki
